hero_2.subtitle: Sports

welcome.subtitle: Club History
welcome.title: Welcome to CDEFF
welcome.description:
The Clube Desportivo da Escola Francisco Franco (CDEFF), is intended for the training of athletes in basketball, futsal and orienteering, having been founded on October 24, 2005. The Club is located at the Escola Secund√°ria Francisco Franco, in the city of Funchal, whose main message is the union and formation of a school community directly related to sport, not only taking into account the competitive aspect, but above all the training aspect.
Currently, it has approximately 150 athletes registered in all levels of training between 5 and 19 years old, including a senior women's team featured in the I Women's Basketball League.
CDEFF seeks to create habits of occupation of young people's free time, through sport, as a complement to school activities, promoting well-being, health, compliance with rules and their social integration. Our main goal is to train and prepare athletes for the future, both on a sporting and personal level, always including the values of sport and life, justifying the growth in number of athletes who intend to be trained in our Club.

mission.subtitle: Mission
mission.title: Promoting education through sports
mission.description: Our mission is to promote the interest of children and youth aged between 5 and 19 in the development of sports practice, based on principles of ethics, competitive and social spirit, and the integral formation of the athletes, maintaining high standards of demand and quality, where human and sports development in young people is reconciled.

vision.subtitle: Vision and Values
vision.title: CDEFF aims to be a benchmark
vision.description: CDEFF aims to occupy a position of great regional and national reference in the training of young people in various sports, at a high level of quality, enabling them to achieve higher performance levels, in order to keep up with the growth in the number of registered athletes and their values, as well as the goal of continuous improvement of the quality of services provided to current and future athletes. The core values include the importance of sports opportunities that all young people should have, coupled with the importance of providing all athletes with all the necessary conditions for physical exercise and sport, as well as the following principles: team spirit and mutual aid, the direct contribution to life training (based on the slogan ‚ÄúSport forming for life‚Äù), promoting the academic success of athletes, and the values of sportsmanship, ethics, responsibility, friendship, respect, punctuality, discipline, commitment, dedication, fair play, and guaranteeing a healthy lifestyle.

sponsors.title: Our Sponsors
sponsors.subtitle: Sponsors
sponsors.description: Our existence would not be possible without the support of our sponsors and partners, who support us daily towards our growth, and are fundamental elements in our success. To all of you, Thank you! Want to support our Club? Become a sponsor/partner!

activities.title: Activities
activities.subtitle: activities
activities.description: Our club is a hub of animation throughout the year, offering a variety of activities for all ages. From the joy of the ATL, filled with interactive activities and educational workshops, to the practice of orienteering, muay thai, zumba, and gymnastics, there is never a dull moment. We are also experts in creating magical birthday celebrations, tailored to your dream. Join us to live unforgettable experiences and become part of this community spirit!

welcome.title: Make sports your school
welcome.subtitle: Welcome to basketball
welcome.description: In basketball, we train our athletes both athletically and humanely, primarily promoting the development of civic habits and values, socialization, and sports integration.

membership.title: Join this family, become a member!
membership.description: We want you to be part of this family! How? Easy! Just become a member and take advantage of all exclusive offers we have for you! Fill out the form bellow.

welcome.title: More than a sport, a passion
welcome.subtitle: Welcome to futsal
welcome.description: In futsal, we function as a true family, where everyone's support is fundamental! Our main goal is to foster the essential values of the true sporting spirit and to increase the motivational levels of our players! As our motto goes, ‚ÄúUNITED WE WILL WIN‚Äù!

tournaments.title: Tournaments
tournaments.noTournaments: For the moment, there're no available tournaments for the selected sport.

section_1.title: ATL
section_1.description: There‚Äôs nothing better than taking the time to have fun and make new friends! In our Easter and Summer ATL, we have activities that you will love, from nautical activities, trips to the beach and the movies, cooking, karaoke, interactive games and much more! Come and live a unique experience, develop new skills and meet new people who will probably become friends for life! We promise to guarantee maximum fun and happiness at all times!

section_2.title: Birthday Organization
section_2.description:
In our Club, we have the solution to create unforgettable birthday parties for birthdays and guests, with the possibility of carrying out various recreational and sports activities in the school‚Äôs indoor gymnasium. Come and have fun with us!
For bookings or more informations, please contact us.

section_3.title: Orienteering
section_3.description:
Recently, the Club joined the Orienteering modality ‚Äì ORIFF, with prof. Alexandra Fonseca in charge of this department.
As the name implies, orienteering is a sport where, in addition to the athlete having to complete a course in the best possible time, you should orient yourself only with the help of a map and a compass.
This modality, in addition to contributing to the improvement of physical and motor skills: cardio, endurance, respiratory capacity, muscle work and proprioception, of young people and other practicing athletes (of the most varied age groups, from an early age to where the physical condition allows), it contributes to the development of mental and intellectual capacities such as: reflection, deduction, logic, discovery and sense of direction. Thus increasing self-confidence, socialization, physical and mental well-being, also enjoying the surroundings with the environment and nature.
For more information, please contact us.

section_4.title: Muay Thai
section_4.description: Muay Thai offers a unique and stimulating experience for martial arts enthusiasts and those looking for a challenging sport. Under the guidance of qualified instructors, participants have the opportunity to learn authentic Muay Thai techniques, as well as develop skills such as discipline, concentration, and self-control.
schedule: advanced and those interested in competitions: 8.30pm to 9.30pm
section_4.contact: For more information or to register, please contact teacher Marisol at 966372155.

section_5.title: Zumba
section_5.description: Discover the joy of dancing and burn calories to the infectious rhythm of Zumba classes, a unique combination of Latin dance moves and aerobic exercise.
section_5.contact: For more information and to enrol, contact √âlton Camacho at 966410578.

section_6.title: Gymnastics
section_6.description: Whatever your fitness goal (to strengthen your body, improve your posture, or simply enjoy a pleasurable physical activity) these classes offer the ideal environment to achieve your goals. These classes are run by the Clube Desportivo Nacional, guaranteeing the quality and professional guidance necessary for safe and effective training.
section_6.contact: For more information and to enrol, please contact 966573753.

questions.question: What are the training times for basketball and futsal?
questions.answer: To check the basketball training times {basketballLink}. For futsal training times {futsalLink}.

questions.question: What sports are available and their respective costs?
questions.answer: Our club offers three sports: basketball, futsal, and orienteering. For more information and the costs of each sport, contact us at {phoneLink} or send an email to {emailLink}.

questions.question: What are the age groups for basketball and futsal?
questions.answer: In basketball, we have the following age groups: seniors, women's and men's under-18s, women's and men's under-16s, women's and men's under-14s, women's and men's mini 12s, mini 8s, and mini 10s. In futsal, we have the following age groups: seniors, juniors, youths, beginners, children, juniors, small children, and small children.

questions.question: What is the cost of the equipment?
questions.answer: To consult the catalogue of available equipment and the respective costs, {equipmentLink}.

questions.question: Information about the ATL
questions.answer: The ATL is aimed at children between the ages of 6 and 14. We organise the Easter ATL, lasting approximately 2 weeks, and the Summer ATL, lasting 2 months. Activities include jet skiing, painting, IT, cinema, cooking, trips to the beach and museums, karaoke sessions, gymnastics and trampolining, horse riding, climbing, among others. For more information on the ATL, {atlLink}.

questions.question: Information on organising birthdays
questions.answer: Birthdays are held inside the school, with various activities included, such as inflatable, giant trampoline, pedal cars, table tennis, music system, table football, PlayStation, arcade machine, and the option to play football on the synthetic pitch. A snack consisting of jelly beans, madeleines, popcorn, Filipinos, mini ham sandwiches, crisps, juices, and water is provided. Decorations include balloons and tablecloths. A monitor will oversee the entire party. The party has a limit of 30 children, costing ‚Ç¨250, including everything mentioned above, except the cake.

Your message is important to us, and our team is ready to assist you!

metadata.description: At the Francisco Franco Sports Club, we believe that sports are a tool for personal and social development. Through sports practice, our athletes learn to work as a team, respect others and themselves, be more responsible, and maintain a positive attitude towards life.
